# asData

**Type Property**

An option to read data from the pasteboard as-is and return it as a data object.

## Declaration

```swift
static var asData: NSPasteboard.ReadingOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the default value. AppKit returns the data in an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object.

## Options

- **asString**: An option to read data from the pasteboard and convert it to a string object.
- **asPropertyList**: An option to read data from the pasteboard and unserialize it as a property list.
- **asKeyedArchive**: An option to read data from the pasteboard and use it to initialize the object.
